summary: Angular 20 frontend migration testing complete. All 15 features tested. Firebase Auth works (signup/login), Firestore times out (expected - database not created). All UI components render correctly, navigation works, route guards functional.

backend_issues.note: NO BACKEND - This is a serverless app using Firebase Auth + Firestore directly from frontend

integration_issues.issue: All Firestore read/write operations timeout after 5-8 seconds. Expected behavior as Firestore database may not be created in Firebase Console yet.
integration_issues.priority: INFO - Not a bug, expected as noted in review request

issues: Icons inside feature cards appear faded/sanitized due to Angular innerHTML sanitization. SVG icons not rendering properly. Shows 'WARNING: sanitizing HTML stripped some content' in console.

frontend: Landing page renders at / with 'Kids Money' branding
Landing page shows 4 feature cards (Tasks & Rewards, Smart Saving, SIP Investing, Fun Stories)
Landing page has Sign In and Get Started CTA buttons
Login page at /login renders with Welcome Back title
Login page has Parent/Kid tabs that switch between forms correctly
Parent login form has email and password fields
Kid login form has parent email, kid name, and PIN fields
Signup page at /signup has full name, email, password fields
Signup page has Create Account button that creates Firebase Auth user
Parent signup redirects to /dashboard after account creation
Parent dashboard shows 'Add Your First Child' empty state
Add Child modal opens with all fields: name, age, grade, avatar, UI theme, PIN, starting balance
Add Child modal has 3 UI theme options: Adventure (boy), Fantasy (girl), Nature (neutral)
Add Child modal has 5+ avatar options (panda, fox, owl, lion, bear)
Sidebar navigation works: Dashboard, Tasks, Wallet, Goals, Invest (sip), Borrow (loans), Learn, Settings
All parent pages load: /tasks, /wallet, /goals, /sip, /loans, /learning, /settings
Settings page shows profile info (name and email)
Dark mode toggle works in header
Dark mode toggle works in Settings page
Logout button redirects to landing page
Route guard: unauthenticated user accessing /dashboard redirects to /login
Route guard: unauthenticated user accessing /kid/dashboard redirects to /login

action_items: SVG icons in innerHTML are being sanitized by Angular. Consider using Angular's DomSanitizer.bypassSecurityTrustHtml() for trusted icon content, or switch to Angular component-based icons
Firestore database needs to be created in Firebase Console for full functionality
Consider adding loading states/spinners when Firestore operations timeout
critical_code_review_comments: SVG icons using innerHTML are being sanitized - many console warnings: 'WARNING: sanitizing HTML stripped some content'. Should use DomSanitizer or component-based approach
Firestore timeout handling is good (5-8 second timeouts with graceful fallback)
Good use of data-testid attributes throughout all interactive elements
Code is well-structured with standalone components and proper TypeScript typing

test_credentials.note: Test accounts created during testing via Firebase Auth signup. Any email/password combo works for signup.

seed_data_creation: None - Firebase Auth handles user creation
context_for_next_testing_agent: Angular 20 + Firebase migration complete. Firebase Auth works for signup/login. Firestore operations timeout (expected - DB not created). All pages render, navigation works, route guards protect /dashboard and /kid/dashboard routes. Dark mode toggle functional. Add Child modal has all required fields. SVG icons have sanitization warnings but app is functional.
features_tested_in_this_iteration: Signup page fields and form submission
Parent signup flow with Firebase Auth
Dashboard empty state and Add Child button
Add Child modal with all form fields
Sidebar navigation to all parent pages
